name: LOLPOUM
description:
FLY

Lol poum is a small game in wich you will most of the time crash poor creatures on high buildings. Some of you may succed and lead their wingsuiters to victory without painting walls with blood.  How far will you go through the machiavelic levels of Lolpoum?

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Lolpoum allow you to play on local network at up to 4 players. 

4x times more deaths, 4x more blood, 4x more fun!

Perfect game to play with friends in spanish classes.

CREATE YOUR OWN LEVELS

Use the multiplayer level editor to design with your friends your own levels, and export them in .lvl files!
